scripts.tmp: gcloud beta emulators datastore start --no-store-on-disk & sleep 5 ;
scripts.test: node_modules/.bin/nyc node_modules/.bin/serial-mocha test/*.js --sort | tee test-output.txt && ./node_modules/.bin/nyc report --reporter=clover && ! grep -q -oP "\d+\sfailing" test-output.txt && rm test-output.txt || { echo "Test output is located in 'test-output.txt'" ; exit 1 ; }
